RoviSys’ extensive process control and automation knowledge and integration experience provide control system integration enhancements and improved manufacturing execution when applied to your process. These services help you realize greater value from your investment by detecting process problems and issues and identifying and implementing performance improvements.
Process Automation and Control System Integration (CSI) activities are core to RoviSys

business. We have successfully commissioned systems for over 800 customers, meeting their schedule and budget needs while delivering superior value. Implementing control systems for continuous and batch processes is our strength. RoviSys delivers systems that serve our clients using DCS, PLC
and PC platforms, independent of any hardware or software vendor. We have integrated every major DCS, PLC
and HMI control system and platform.
RoviSys has an in-depth knowledge of control systems in a variety of vertical markets. Our focus is control of
process. Our overall architecture experience includes specification
of instrumentation and final control elements, communications networks, control room design, electrical distribution

RoviSys is a market leader in the use of S88 batch software, the industry standard for PLC and DCS-based batch applications. We are one of the first integrators to apply supervisory batch working directly with software providers. We demonstrated that both DCS and PLC batch systems
have a place in your solutions. We can help you choose and implement the best system for your application.

Control system architecture and technology selection.
Specification of instrumentation and final control elements.

that all projects are executed using proven, repeatable, and documented work practices. The RoviSys methodology is a sequence of clearly established phases

Employee Safety is one of the most vital aspects of our Company's operations
. No operation at our company is
significant enough to be done in an unsafe manner. The safer our workplace, the more efficient and
our operation is. Our policy is designed to maintain the highest level of safety and minimize accidents.

Manager, supervisors, and employees are directly responsible for ensuring that a safe work environment is maintained and that RoviSys safety practices and procedures are followed. The use of safe tools and protective equipment are mandatory as is participation in safety meetings and following safety rules. All employees are responsible for everyone they work with and around.

services to several industries using our core capabilities in process control, advanced process services and manufacturing enterprise solutions. We believe that industry knowledge is as important as technology expertise.

Whether specifying plant-floor instrumentation or integrating operational data into a business planning system, our engineers are trained and encouraged to view each project through the requirements, regulations and priorities of the end customer.
